description: User Registration with Multi-factor and SSO support. Verifies that a new user can register using either a standard form with detailed business info (Base Currency, Time Zone) or via SSO providers (Google, Microsoft, etc.).
steps: Step 1: Navigate to the Sign Up page
Step 2: Enter Company Name, User Name, Email, Country, Base Currency, and Time Zone
Step 3: Alternatively, select an SSO provider (e.g., Google) to register
Step 4: Verify email confirmation is received and account is created

description: System Preferences Configuration. Verifies that an administrator can configure global application settings including Date/Time formats and Invoice rounding rules.
steps: Step 3: Set 'Date Format', 'Time Zone', and 'Number Format'
Step 4: Configure 'Max Rounding Error' and 'Smallest Denomination for Rounding' (e.g., 0.05)
Step 5: Toggle 'Auto Fix Round Of Error during Invoice' and save

description: Receipt and Invoice Printing Options. Verifies that the system allows customization of receipt outputs, including print formats and content visibility.
steps: Step 1: Navigate to Admin > Preferences > Invoice Section
Step 3: Toggle 'Print Customer Address on Receipt' and 'Print Denominations entries on the receipt'
Step 4: Enable 'Automatically print Invoice after saving'
Step 5: Save and verify settings persist

description: Company Profile Management. Verifies that the admin can update company details and upload a logo which appears on receipts.
steps: Step 1: Navigate to Admin > Company Profile
Step 2: Enter Company Name, Address, City, State/Province, and Postal Code
Step 3: Upload a Company Logo image file
Step 4: Save and verify the logo preview is updated

description: Branch Management CRUD. Verifies ability to create, update, and manage multiple business branches, including a Head Office.
steps: Step 3: Input a unique 3-letter Branch Code (e.g., HOF), Name, and Address
Step 4: Set Status to 'Active' and save
Step 5: Verify the new branch appears in the list view

description: Branch Deletion Integrity Check. Verifies that branches with existing transaction history cannot be deleted, while unused branches can be.
steps: Step 2: Attempt to delete a branch that has associated transactions (Verify error/blocking)
Step 3: Create a dummy branch with no history
Step 4: Delete the dummy branch (Verify success)

description: User Role and Account Management. Verifies the creation of user accounts with specific roles (Teller, Manager, Compliance) and security settings.
steps: Step 3: Enter Name, Email, Password, and select a Role (e.g., Teller)
Step 4: Define a 'User Alias' for receipt printing
Step 5: Set a 'User PIN' for high-security transactions
Step 6: Assign to a specific Branch (or leave blank for roaming) and Save

description: User Transaction Limits and Security. Verifies that specific limits can be enforced per user and 2FA can be enabled.
steps: Step 1: Edit an existing User profile
Step 2: Input a value for 'Transaction Limit Per Day' (e.g., 10000)
Step 4: Check 'Is Verified' to bypass email verification for testing
Step 5: Save and verify the user list reflects these settings

description: Visual Dashboard and Menu Layout. Verifies the application layout matches the reference material's sidebar navigation and dashboard widgets.
steps: Step 1: Log in to the main Dashboard
Step 2: Verify Top Navigation Bar contains module shortcuts (Contacts, Currencies, Bookings, etc.)
Step 3: Verify the Admin Dropdown menu contains sub-items: Preferences, Company Profile, Roles, Branches, Users
Step 4: Verify Dashboard charts (Volume by Currency, Top Selling, etc.) are visible

description: Lookup Data Management. Verifies that an administrator can configure dynamic system dropdown menus (e.g., Customer Groups, Payment Methods, Sources of Funds) to standardize data entry across the application.
steps: Step 3: Select a 'Lookup Key' (e.g., Group Type)
Step 4: Enter a 'Lookup Value' (e.g., VIP or Tourist) and Save
Step 5: Verify the new option appears in the relevant forms

description: Currency Denomination Configuration. Verifies the ability to define specific banknote and coin values for inventory tracking, including the ability to view visual references of banknotes.
steps: Step 3: Select a Currency (e.g., CAD) and enter a Value (e.g., 50)
Step 4: Click 'View Bank Notes' to visualize the bill
Step 5: Save and verify the denomination is added to the list

description: Currency Inventory and Rate Setup. Verifies adding a new tradeable currency, configuring buy/sell margins (markup/markdown), and fetching live market rates.
steps: Step 1: Navigate to Currencies > Currency Grid
Step 2: Click 'Add Currency' and select a currency code (e.g., PLN)
Step 3: Configure 'Markup %' and 'Markdown %' for automatic rate calculation
Step 4: Toggle 'Active' and assign to specific Branches
Step 5: Click 'Get Rate' to test live market data connection and Save

description: Tiered Rate Configuration (Currency Aliases). Verifies the creation of special rate tiers (e.g., VIP rates) using currency aliases to offer better margins for high-volume customers.
steps: Step 1: Navigate to Currencies > Currency Grid > Add New
Step 2: Select an existing currency but define a 'Currency Alias' (e.g., EUR-VIP)
Step 3: Set more competitive margins than the standard rate
Step 4: Save and verify the alias appears as a distinct entry on the Rate Board

description: Individual Customer Onboarding (KYC/AML). Verifies the creation of individual customer profiles, automatic sanction list screening, and document management.
steps: Step 1: Navigate to Contacts > Individuals > Add New
Step 2: Enter Personal Details (Name, Nationality, DOB)
Step 3: Save and verify the system automatically performs a 'Check against Sanction List'
Step 4: Navigate to 'Supporting Documents' tab and upload an ID image
Step 5: Navigate to 'Bank Info' tab and add a wire template

description: Digital Rate Board Display. Verifies that the public-facing rate board correctly renders currencies, flags, and tiered rates based on the configuration.
steps: Step 1: Navigate to Admin > Currencies Rate Board
Step 2: Generate/Click the Rate Board URL for a specific branch
Step 3: Verify the page displays a table with Flag, Currency Code, Buy Rate, and Sell Rate
Step 4: Confirm 'VIP' tiered rates appear separately if configured

description: Advanced KYC/AML Profiling. Verifies the collection of enhanced due diligence data for customers, including source of funds, PEP (Politically Exposed Person) status, and custom AML risk flagging.
steps: Step 1: Navigate to Contacts > Individuals > Edit Customer > KYC/AML Tab
Step 2: Enter 'Estimated Asset Worth' and 'Source of Funds'
Step 3: Toggle 'Suspicious' and provide a reason
Step 4: Check 'PEP Status' if applicable and save

description: Sanction List Whitelisting. Verifies the ability to manually override false positive sanction matches and whitelist a customer for a specific duration.
steps: Step 1: Navigate to Contacts > Individuals > KYC/AML Tab
Step 2: Check 'Match is false positive' and enter a 'Basis of Determination'
Step 3: Check 'White Listed' and select an expiry date for the whitelist status
Step 4: Save and verify the customer is no longer flagged on the dashboard

description: General Ledger Main Account Setup. Verifies the creation of high-level parent accounts (Assets, Liabilities, Equity, Revenue, Expenses) to structure the Chart of Accounts.
steps: Step 1: Navigate to Modules > Main Accounts > Add
Step 2: Enter a 'Main Account Code' (e.g., 6000) and 'Name' (e.g., Operating Expenses)
Step 3: Select the 'Main Account Type' (e.g., Expenses) and save
Step 4: Verify the account appears in the Main Accounts grid

description: Sub-Ledger Account Configuration. Verifies the creation of specific transactional accounts linked to Main Accounts, with functional flags for Banking, Inventory, and UI visibility.
steps: Step 1: Navigate to Modules > Accounts > Add
Step 2: Select a 'Main Account ID' to link to (e.g., Accounts Payable)
Step 4: Toggle functional flags: 'Is Bank?', 'Is Cash?', or 'Display as Dropdown in Invoices'
Step 5: Save and verify the sub-ledger is active

description: Till (Cash Register) Management with Auto-Account Creation. Verifies the creation of physical/digital tills and the system's ability to automatically generate sub-ledger accounts for every currency for that till.
steps: Step 1: Navigate to Teller > Tills > Add
Step 2: Enter 'Till ID' and 'Name', and assign to a Branch (or Head Office)
Step 3: Check 'Auto create cash accounts' and Save
Step 4: Click the 'Create Cash Accounts' button in the toolbar
Step 5: Navigate to Modules > Accounts and verify a Cash Account exists for every system currency linked to this Till ID

description: Till Session Management (Sign-in/Sign-out). Verifies that tellers can secure a till by signing in to begin a shift and signing out to release it.
steps: Step 2: Locate a specific Till and click the 'Sign In' button (or icon)
Step 3: Confirm the 'Signed in User' column updates to the current user
Step 4: Click 'Sign Out' and confirm the till is released
